Title: Establishes the New York state climate change task force
Summary: Establishes the New York state climate change task force; establishes the membership of the task force; establishes the powers and duties of the task force.
LawCode: Add Art 19 Title 13 §§19-1301 - 19-1305, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing the New York state climate change task force
